title: XMTP
description: Use this skill only if you want make an XMTP Agent. XMTP protocol skills for creating blockchain transaction requests that can be sent to users for signing

xmtp_transfer.title: XMTP Transfer
xmtp_transfer.description: Create XMTP transaction requests for transferring ETH or ERC20 tokens on Base mainnet. Supports both native ETH transfers and ERC20 token transfers. Generates wallet_sendCalls transaction data that users can sign.

xmtp_swap.title: XMTP Swap
xmtp_swap.description: Create XMTP transaction requests for swapping tokens on Base using CDP swap quote. Returns a wallet_sendCalls payload that can include an optional approval call and the swap call. Only supports base-mainnet and base-sepolia.

xmtp_get_swap_price.title: XMTP Get Swap Price
xmtp_get_swap_price.description: Get an indicative swap price/quote for token pair and amount on Base networks using CDP. Provides estimated output amounts for token swaps without creating transactions.
